text: Came here to purchase a present for our friend’s baby. The staff were very friendly in helping us find a good toy present. I would say you could find a range of products for children between 1-10 years old (older kids might be too digitalized to be interested).

Kevin shop assistant was very patient to answer my every question and need, and also helped me communicate and shoot videos, so that I have more understanding and understanding of the products, very pleasant shopping experience, thank you!

Super helpful and knowledgeable! Kevin went above and beyond to help me find the perfect toys, providing educational content and insights to guide my decision. An amazing staff member at the Tanglin Mall branch! Big thanks to Yi Jie for being very nice and helpful too.

I would like to share a very positive review. The Better Toy Store reacted amazingly well to a problem with a toy we bought from them for Christmas. They answer our concerns within minutes and arranged for pick up of the damaged toy and delivery of a new one at our home the day right after Christmas. Excellent selection of toys there and fantastic customer service staff !

Various kinds of products
Well selected
Good price
